description: A vibrant and modern illustration depicting a happy family, including parents, children, and grandparents, all covered by a Bajaj Allianz Corona Kavach insurance policy. The image should showcase a sense of security, peace of mind, and financial protection, emphasizing the policy's comprehensive coverage for COVID-19 related hospitalisation expenses. The image should include the Bajaj Allianz logo and the tagline 'Corona Kavach: Your Shield Against COVID-19.'

A visually appealing infographic depicting the different options offered by Floater for COVID-19 coverage. The infographic should include clear visual representations of the following:  

- Ambulance services with a maximum of 2000/hour for hospitalization.
- Home care treatment with a maximum of 14 days per event.
- A prominent call to action to visit the COVID website for more information.

A colorful and modern infographic illustrating the benefits of a health insurance policy. It should feature icons representing the different aspects of coverage, such as homecare, COVID-19 treatment, and alternative medicine (Ayurveda, Yoga, Naturopathy, Unani, Siddha, and Homeopathy). The infographic should be visually appealing and easy to understand, highlighting the key features of the policy.

A medical insurance policy document with a highlighted section about pre-hospital/home care treatment medical expenses related to hospitalization in an approved hospital. The document should clearly state that expenses not included in the policy are listed under Annexure-A of List-I.  The document should also include a list of alternative policy benefits and SHA, with COVID hospitalisation expenses being specified separately. It should mention that the policy covers hospital daily cash for every 24 hours of continuous hospitalization.

A document with a legal disclaimer written in Hindi, mentioning insurance coverage for daily hospitalization, home care treatment limits, company identification numbers, and exclusion of COVID-19 treatment expenses. The document should have a formal and official tone.

A document outlining insurance policy details. The document should include information about premium charges, coverage options, claim procedures, and required documents. The document should be in a professional and easily understandable format. The text should be written in Hindi and should include the following information: Premium charges for 2 or more members under the floater sum insured option. Claim submission process with required documents such as passport copy, patient ID proof, medical prescriptions, and hospital discharge summaries.
